title: Deepfake Audio Detection
description: A Flutter-based mobile app that detects deepfake audio using on-device ML. Features clean architecture, DI, and localization.

title: Muslim App
description: A mobile application providing prayer times, Quran reading, and Hadith integration.

title: ChatBot App
description: An AI-driven to-do list application with Firebase authentication and local persistence.

title: E-commerce App
description: A fruits marketplace application featuring product listings, cart functionality, and user profiles.

title: Quora Copy
description: A responsive Q&A platform built with Vue.js, featuring question posting, answer upvoting, and user profiles.
